body:
Dear Talent Acquisition Team,

Please find attached the parsed resume summary to support your shortlisting and coordination process. This report includes structured candidate information extracted from resumes submitted recently through the Cognitive Document Intelligence Platform.

The summary will assist in:
- Identifying key candidate attributes
- Pre-screening applicants based on role alignment
- Prioritizing outreach based on resume insights

If you require additional formatting or candidate filters, please feel free to connect with the support team.

Best regards,
